title: App defaults to today's games
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app is not running in the background (suspended)
AND the time is after 10 am ET
AND the user has set "Scores View" for launch preference in Settings (if Home Team enabled)

Note: this time is configurable - check with TPM for expected "Today" time
custom_steps: WHEN the user launches the app
custom_expected: THEN the app opens to today's date

title: Tile Navigation
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user launches the app
AND has selected a date that has games on it be either today's date or any other date
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects a date AND navigates all the games presented
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be bound inside within the games shown 
AND is not able to swipe left or right outside bounds 
AND is able to swipe down if there are more than 15 games on a day

title: All available games presented on TODAY are able to be selected
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app is launched
AND we are logged in with a Premium Account
AND we are viewing TODAY
AND there are live and archive games available TODAY
custom_steps:
WHEN we attempt to navigate to games TODAY that have media attached (live/VOD as available) 
AND we activate the game tile
custom_expected: THEN all **expected** game tiles can be opened to FEED SELECT _Note: In ST some games may not have media present_

title: All the games shown are presented correctly on-screen based off MLB.com
custom_preconds: GIVEN we are viewing TODAY in Scores View
custom_steps: WHEN we compare TODAY's Schedule at https://www.mlb.com with the Scores View displayed games

title: Each game tile presents the away team first and the home team second
custom_preconds: GIVEN we are viewing a regular season Live or Archive game's Feed Select
custom_steps: WHEN we observe the HOME and AWAY feeds
custom_expected:
THEN we see Away feed 1st on the left, Home feed 2nd on the right 
AND the associated team logos match correct Away/Home expected teams (Note: this is typically an issue with new MLB rewrites only, the Home and Away don't match or are displayed on the wrong sides)

title: User is able to access all available archive games in the present year and two previous seasons
custom_preconds:
GIVEN app is launched - Prod-facing
AND we are logged into a Premium Account
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate via Calendar to a ST game and a Regular Season game for the current Season and the two previous seasons 
AND we launch at least one of each available example* *Current Regular Season games are not available during ST - and some tiles in ST may not have Media attached
custom_expected: THEN each the of available games can be accessed and launched
